Label: K1 - ACE Solar Wind Experiment 1-Hour Key Parameters [PRELIM] - D. J. McComas (Southwest Research Institute)

VariableDescription.Name: Np
VariableDescription.LongDescription: [PRELIMINARY VALUES - BROWSE USE ONLY] Solar Wind Proton Number Density, scalar
VariableDescription.Header:
#              ************************************
#              *****    GLOBAL ATTRIBUTES    ******
#              ************************************
#
#     TITLE                           ACE> Solar Wind Parameters
#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics
#     DISCIPLINE                      Space Physics>Interplanetary Studies
#     SOURCE_NAME                     AC>Advanced Composition Explorer
#     DATA_TYPE                       K1>1-Hour Key Parameter
#     DESCRIPTOR                      SWE>ACE Solar Wind Electron Proton Alpha Monitor
#     DATA_VERSION                    2
#     GENERATED_BY                    ACE Science Center
#     GENERATION_DATE                 20100810
#     TEXT                            SWEPAM - Solar Wind Electron Proton Alpha Monitor
#                                     References: http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/
#                                     ACE browse data is designed for monitoring large scale particle and field
#                                     behavior and for selecting interesting time periods. The data is automatically
#                                     generated from the spacecraft data stream using simple algorithms provided by
#                                     the instrument teams. It is not routinely checked for accuracy and is subject
#                                     to revision. Use this data at your own risk, and consult with the appropriate
#                                     instrument teams about citing it.
#                                     SWEPAM Browse data is not validated by the experimenters and should not be used
#                                     except for preliminary examination prior to detailed studies.
#     MODS                            Initial Release 12/01/98
#     ADID_REF                        NSSD0327
#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 AC_K1_SWE_20100801_V02
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  AC_K1_SWE
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      K1 - ACE Solar Wind Experiment 1-Hour Key Parameters [PRELIM]
#     PI_NAME                         D. J. McComas
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  Southwest Research Institute
#     MISSION_GROUP                   ACE
#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU
#     INSTRUMENT_TYPE                 Plasma and Solar Wind
#     TIME_RESOLUTION                 1 hour
#     WEB_SITE                        http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/
#     ACKNOWLEDGEMENT                 Please acknowledge the Principal
#                                     Investigator, D. J. McComas of
#                                     NASA LANL
#     RULES_OF_USE                    See the rules of use available from the ACE
#                                     Science Center at:
#                                     http://www.srl.caltech.edu/ACE/
#     ALT_LOGICAL_SOURCE              ACE_SWEPAM_Solar-Wind-Plasma-Key-Parameters-K1_1hour_cdf
#     CDFMAJOR                        COL_MAJOR
#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered
#  2. [PRELIMINARY VALUES - BROWSE USE ONLY] Solar Wind Proton Number Density, scalar
#       NOTES:  Np is the proton number density in units of cm-3, as calculated by integrating the ion distribution function.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Mon May 16 10:17:47 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  Np is the proton number density in units of cm-3, as calculated by integrating the ion distribution function.
#
EPOCH                   SW_H_NUM_DENSITY
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms              #/cc
01-08-2010 00:00:00.000          1.02180

VariableDescription.Name: Vp

#                                     ACE browse data is designed for monitoring large scale particle and field
#                                     behavior and for selecting interesting time periods. The data is automatically
#                                     generated from the spacecraft data stream using simple algorithms provided by
#                                     the instrument teams. It is not routinely checked for accuracy and is subject
#                                     to revision. Use this data at your own risk, and consult with the appropriate
#                                     instrument teams about citing it.

#                                     except for preliminary examination prior to detailed studies.

#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  AC_K1_SWE

#     PI_NAME                         D. J. McComas

#                                     !___Interplanetary Data near 1 AU

#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered
#  2. [PRELIMINARY VALUES - BROWSE USE ONLY] Solar Wind Bulk Speed
#       NOTES:  Vp is the solar wind proton speed, or more generally just the solar wind (bulk) speed. It is obtained by integrating the ion (proton) distribution function.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Mon May 16 10:17:47 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  Vp is the solar wind proton speed, or more generally just the solar wind (bulk) speed. It is obtained by integrating the ion (proton) distribution function.
#
EPOCH                   SW_BULK_SPEED
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms           km/s
01-08-2010 00:00:00.000       517.520

VariableDescription.Name: He_ratio

#                                     ACE browse data is designed for monitoring large scale particle and field
#                                     behavior and for selecting interesting time periods. The data is automatically
#                                     generated from the spacecraft data stream using simple algorithms provided by
#                                     the instrument teams. It is not routinely checked for accuracy and is subject
#                                     to revision. Use this data at your own risk, and consult with the appropriate
#                                     instrument teams about citing it.

#                                     except for preliminary examination prior to detailed studies.

#     LOGICAL_FILE_ID                 AC_K1_SWE_20100801_V02
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  AC_K1_SWE
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      K1 - ACE Solar Wind Experiment 1-Hour Key Parameters [PRELIM]
#     PI_NAME                         D. J. McComas

#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered
#  2. [PRELIMINARY VALUES - BROWSE USE ONLY] Percent of Helium++ ions to protons
#       NOTES:  He_ratio is the ratio of the number density of helium++ ions to the number density of protons.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Mon May 16 10:17:48 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  He_ratio is the ratio of the number density of helium++ ions to the number density of protons.
#
EPOCH                         HE++/H+
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms              %
01-08-2010 00:00:00.000     0.0251200

VariableDescription.Name: Tpr
VariableDescription.LongDescription: [PRELIMINARY VALUES - BROWSE USE ONLY] radial component of the proton temperature

#     PROJECT                         ISTP>International Solar-Terrestrial Physics

#     TEXT                            SWEPAM - Solar Wind Electron Proton Alpha Monitor

#                                     ACE browse data is designed for monitoring large scale particle and field
#                                     behavior and for selecting interesting time periods. The data is automatically
#                                     generated from the spacecraft data stream using simple algorithms provided by
#                                     the instrument teams. It is not routinely checked for accuracy and is subject
#                                     to revision. Use this data at your own risk, and consult with the appropriate
#                                     instrument teams about citing it.

#                                     except for preliminary examination prior to detailed studies.

#     LOGICAL_SOURCE                  AC_K1_SWE
#     LOGICAL_SOURCE_DESCRIPTION      K1 - ACE Solar Wind Experiment 1-Hour Key Parameters [PRELIM]
#     PI_NAME                         D. J. McComas
#     PI_AFFILIATION                  Southwest Research Institute

#
#              ************************************
#              ****  RECORD VARYING VARIABLES  ****
#              ************************************
#
#  1. Time, centered
#  2. [PRELIMINARY VALUES - BROWSE USE ONLY] radial component of the proton temperature
#       NOTES:  The radial component of the proton temperature is the (1,1) component of the temperature tensor, along the radial direction. It is obtained by integration of the ion (proton) distribution function.
#
#  
# Key Parameter and Survey data (labels K0,K1,K2) are preliminary browse data.
# Generated by CDAWeb on: Mon May 16 10:17:48 2016
VariableDescription.VariableInfo:
#       NOTES:  The radial component of the proton temperature is the (1,1) component of the temperature tensor, along the radial direction. It is obtained by integration of the ion (proton) distribution function.
#
EPOCH                   H_TEMP_(RADICAL)
dd-mm-yyyy hh:mm:ss.ms            Kelvin
01-08-2010 00:00:00.000          62624.0
